title: Coventry and Ottobeuren join hands
creator_credit: F I B Dr W Lutje
brief_description: In 1964 the Benedictine monastery of Ottobeuren in Bavaria, celebrated its 12th centenary. Taking part in the celebrations was Princess Marina, Duchess of Kent, a manifestation of the cultural ties between Great Britain and Germany.
